body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for contacting Sweet Treats Bakery customer service. My name is Adam Wright. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Adam. My name is Brenda Rivera. I have a question about returning an order.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Brenda. I'm here to help. Could you please provide your order number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's H one zero one two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Got it. Thank you. Could you also tell me the reason for the return?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I received bread instead of the cookies I ordered.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Brenda. I will take care of this for you. Can I have your email address for the confirmation?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Brenda. Your return has been processed. You will receive an email confirmation shortly. Is there anything else I can help you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all. Thank you, Adam!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Brenda. Thank you for your time and have a great day!
